channel.title: Darkhorse Press - Top Story
channel.description: Latest Top Story posts from Darkhorse Press.

item.title: February 13, 2026 - Darkhorse Press
item.description: A Natchez man has been arrested in connection with an outstanding statutory rape warrant in Adams County, according to the Adams County Sheriff’s Office. The sheriff’s office said Michael Shawn Simpson Sr., 43, was taken into custody Feb. 11 at about 12:38 p.m. by deputies with the Special Operations Division. Authorities said the warrant was […]

item.title: February 14, 2026 - Darkhorse Press
item.description: JACKSON — The Mississippi Bureau of Investigation is investigating an officer-involved shooting involving the Capitol Police Department that occurred Saturday near Crestview Street, authorities said. Officers responded to a report of shots fired and found one person lying in the street with what appeared to be a gunshot wound. While an officer was rendering aid, […]

item.title: February 16, 2026 - Darkhorse Press
item.description: JACKSON — St. Dominic said rodeo royalty and professional bullfighters from the Dixie National Rodeo visited the hospital’s Neonatal Intensive Care Unit last week to read to infants. According to St. Dominic, Miss Rodeo America Olivia Favero and Miss Rodeo Canada Abbey Hartey took part in the NICU visit, where babies were dressed in western-themed […]

item.title: February 17, 2026 - Darkhorse Press
item.description: TUPELO — A Saltillo man was arrested and charged with felony marijuana trafficking and felony possession of hydrocodone after a traffic stop in Tupelo and a follow-up search at a residence, according to the North Mississippi Narcotics Unit. Agents said they stopped a 2022 Ford Bronco on Feb. 10 on North Gloster Street for an […]

item.title: February 18, 2026 - Darkhorse Press
item.description: LAMAR COUNTY – A 48-year-old woman has been charged with aggravated assault in a domestic violence case after deputies said a man was stabbed during a fight Monday night at an apartment on Shears Road. Deputies responded around 9 p.m. Feb. 16, 2026, after a reported stabbing, according to authorities. Investigators said a 38-year-old man […]
